channel.title: First login intro?
channel.description: Have even thought about a particular 'first-login-intro'? I want to discuss what you think about first login intro. Should it be just simple without any welcoming dialogue? You prefer a custom cutscene to introduce to the basics? A boss fight from the begining( runescape's dragon under lumbridge)? Give your opinions!

item.title: First login intro?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

arham 4:

Received complaints when it was simple 250k and some other stuff. People want too much now-a-days (high xp rates, lots of starters).

u sold out bruh

Read full topic

item.title: First login intro?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:7, topic:541135”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=660004.msg4413215#msg4413215 date=1394642539]
I made a contest and dared my members to make one for me. The reward was gold 2x the starter (my starter has 5m, so the reward was 10m). Then, for more motivation, I got the “average gold a Roman has” (for me, it was 5,870,000 gp), so they could be higher than the average roman through this contest.
[/quote]
What was the result? Or not yet?[/quote]
Voting by staff + community starts tomorrow for 3 days.

[quote=“Ambokile, post:8, topic:541135”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=660004.msg4413215#msg4413215 date=1394642539]
I made a contest and dared my members to make one for me. The reward was gold 2x the starter (my starter has 5m, so the reward was 10m). Then, for more motivation, I got the “average gold a Roman has” (for me, it was 5,870,000 gp), so they could be higher than the average roman through this contest.
[/quote]

Players on your server start with 5,000,000? Why?[/quote]
Received complaints when it was simple 250k and some other stuff. People want too much now-a-days (high xp rates, lots of starters).

Read full topic

item.title: First login intro?
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Three ideas up. Anything else? I plan to use the gathered information in the future.

item.title: First login intro?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

when I ran a server, I created a cutscene that went through the basic area of the map and then zoomed back to the start position that was a house in lumbridge, it didn’t give a tutorial but gave a feel of where the main game took place.

this sounds nice ^^

but the option to skip it would also be nice

Read full topic

when I ran a server, I created a cutscene that went through the basic area of the map and then zoomed back to the start position that was a house in lumbridge, it didn’t give a tutorial but gave a feel of where the main game took place.

item.title: First login intro?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

I honestly like the “we’ll just leave you to your own devices” method. All you give them is a book on controls (how to play the game) and then where to possibly gather information. This creates desire to play more and also makes your server seem more well developed.

Read full topic
